Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Attack Of Opportunity: May use a Reaction to Strike a foe that uses a manipulate action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square while moving

Point-Blank Shot: Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 attack at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Vengeful Hatred: +1 per die weapon damage vs. choice of drow, duergar, giant, or orc and for 1 min on any foe that inflicts a critical success on attack

Save Notes:
Ancient-Blooded Dwarf: May use Reaction upon save vs. magic to gain +1 vs. magic for 1 rd
Death Warden Dwarf: Successful saves vs. necromancy effects are critical successes
Forge Dwarf: Has fire resistance 1/Treats environmental heat as 1 step less extreme
Rock Dwarf: +2 vs. Shove, Trip, and magical knock prone/Suffers half any forced move distance
Strong-Blooded Dwarf: Has poison resistance 1/Successful saves vs. poison reduce stage by 2 (virulent 1), critical successes by 3 (virulent 2)
